DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the type of dose limiting toxicity.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Toxicity type that makes it impossible to escalate the dosage of a therapy agent/measure.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The amount of medicine taken, or radiation given, at one time.:No value exists.

Concepts.definition: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Property.preferredDefinition: Toxicity; the degree to which something is poisonous.

Concepts.definition: The finding of bodily harm due to the poisonous effects of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the outcome or resolution of the patient's adverse events.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A side effect of a drug or other treatment that is serious enough to necessitate a dose modification._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
